sentences.sContent: He stumbled to the door and found a six-foot cockroach standing there.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stumbled to the door and found a six-foot cockroach standing there.
sentences.sCn: 他跌跌撞撞地去打开门，见到一只六英尺高的蟑螂站在那儿！

sentences.sContent: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.sContent_eng: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.sCn: 蟑螂急匆匆的从冰箱底下跑过去，壁虎在后面也努力的想要钻过去。

sentences.sContent: Competitions include Skating Around Poverty and Welfare Hurdles. Mascots include a cockroach and a rat.
sentences.sContent_eng: Competitions include Skating Around Poverty and Welfare Hurdles. Mascots include a cockroach and a rat.
sentences.sCn: 比赛项目包括贫穷和福利绕障碍滑冰，吉祥物是蟑螂和老鼠。

trans.tranOther: a large black or brown insect that lives in dirty houses, especially if they are warm and there is food to eat
